project.description: This job should be used to upload SSTR files in batch for BioLINCC studies.

hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.name: sstr.tar.gz
hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.description: Can be a single file or tar file that contains multiple files. tar files should be built using "tar -zcf ...".

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
### assume etl role aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
mkdir sstr
tar -zvxf decoded_data.tar.gz -C "${WORKSPACE}"/sstr/
aws s3 cp "${WORKSPACE}"/sstr/ ${s3_location} --recursive
